title: DevCoin History - The First Proof-of-Value Experiment
author: Van Kush Family / FinShaggy
source: Bitcointalk Forum Archives, Direct Participant Account
overview: The complete history of DevCoin - the first cryptocurrency to pay writers for content, including the Van Kush Family's role in scaling it and the governance failures that led to its death

algorithm.advantage: Miners secured DVC 'for free' while mining BTC

emission.purpose: Steady inflationary supply to fuel ongoing economy

distribution_split.innovation: Most radical Proof-of-Value experiment of the era

receiver_file_system.innovation: First to use Receiver Files in coinbase transactions

mechanism.process: New receiver file generated each round
mechanism.function: Decentralized payroll instructing miners where to send 90%

payout_calculation.formula: Total Rewards for Round / Total Shares Claimed = Value per Share
payout_calculation.transparency: CSV file published showing every address and block payment

golden_ratio_algorithm.mechanism: Golden Ratio multiplied by round number to 'cut' the list
golden_ratio_algorithm.result: Addresses starting '1A' didn't always pay before '1Z'
golden_ratio_algorithm.transparency: Users could read Python source code to verify

maturity_period.reason: Ensure coins not part of orphaned chain

devtome_wiki.model: Paid Wikipedia - first of its kind

earning_mechanism.global_arbitrage: $3/hour is 'really good money' in emerging countries

requirements.wallet: Must use local client - web wallets couldn't handle generated coins

streaming_income.innovation: Web3 still trying to perfect this model in 2026

the_growth_agent.achievement: Scaled DevTome from 15 authors to 75+ writers
the_growth_agent.vision: Global workforce earning cryptocurrency for content

phase_a_the_club.characteristics: Low friction, low utility, stable price

the_conflict.core_15_reaction: Viewed growth as 'Sybil Attack' or 'Reward Harvesting'
the_conflict.the_lie: Accused FinShaggy of paying a 'Fiverr Girl' for YouTube videos
the_conflict.truth: Was actually a personal friend helping voluntarily

the_rescinded_offer.event: Unthinkingbit listed new admins, then edited post
the_rescinded_offer.quote: Edit: I rescinded the offer of other administrative work to FinShaggy
the_rescinded_offer.significance: Downgraded from Promotion Administrator to banned in single post

manual_governance_crisis.problem: Manual editing of Receiver Files to exclude users
manual_governance_crisis.broke: The 'Code is Law' promise of blockchain
manual_governance_crisis.result: Admins could ban anyone they disliked

the_core_15_mindset.priority: Individual share size over network value
the_core_15_mindset.counter_argument: Distribution IS value - more users = more demand

admin_selection.flaw: No court of appeal for rescinded offers or bans

english_only_barrier.restriction: English only, warnings against poor grammar
english_only_barrier.effect: Banned emerging country writers FinShaggy was recruiting
english_only_barrier.opportunity_lost: Could have rivaled Wikipedia's global scale

no_security.vulnerability: Single hater could delete dozens of articles
no_security.example: Fuzzy Bear's Archaeology article deleted by 'categorizing'
no_security.quote: No security in place - system held together by duct tape

price_history.peak_2014: $0.0015 - massive gains for early writers with millions of DVC
price_history.current_2026: Near zero, not traded on major exchanges

the_1000_to_1_theory.claim: DVC would track BTC at 1000:1 ratio
the_1000_to_1_theory.reality: Failed due to DVC inflation vs BTC scarcity
the_1000_to_1_theory.note: $1,000 BTC prediction came true (Nov 2013), $1 DVC never materialized

exchange_issues.cryptsy: Delisted DVC/BTC pair - ran out of decimal places
exchange_issues.lesson: Low price relative to BTC creates trading infrastructure problems

buy_wall_theory.definition: Order so large it prevents price from moving lower
buy_wall_theory.example: 14+ BTC order at 74 satoshis on Vircurex
buy_wall_theory.psychology: Giant walls ENCOURAGE dumping - guaranteed exit
buy_wall_theory.counter: Pumps create FOMO, walls create dumps

pump_strategy.definition: Buying above market rate to drive FOMO
pump_strategy.effect: Makes people hold or buy more
pump_strategy.criticism: Artificial pumps are 'second-rate schemes' lasting only a day

order_priority.tactic: Bid 1 satoshi higher to jump queue during buy wall

early_adopter_indicators.1_percent_rule: If you need 'special computer skills' to invest, still early
early_adopter_indicators.neighbor_indicator: When neighbors talk crypto = time to sell
early_adopter_indicators.media_indicator: Mainstream media mocking = still early adopter territory

asicminer_pt.type: Pass-through shares of Bitcoin mining hardware
asicminer_pt.issue: Often overvalued in DVC - nothing else to do with coins

dvb_devcoin_stock.purpose: Investment into DVC mining hardware (Avalons, Jupiters)
dvb_devcoin_stock.goal: Secure chain with Terahashes to prove 'here to stay'

cryptostocks.function: Early way to 'put Devcoins to work'

the_disconnect.conflict: Proof of Work mentality vs Proof of Value vision

client_download_crisis.fix: Community relied on forum posts and Dropbox links

mac_encryption_bug.cause: Encrypting wallet on Mac crashed client

100_address_rule.mechanism: Wallet generates pool of 100 unused addresses
100_address_rule.reason: Change addresses move outside original backup pool

web_wallet_limitation.problem: Cannot receive DVC payouts to web wallet
web_wallet_limitation.reason: Generated coins (coinbase) not recognized by web wallets
web_wallet_limitation.result: Every writer had to run local client

inflation_kills.fix: Burn mechanics essential (HIVE-Engine tokens learned this)

distribution_is_value.truth: More users = more demand = higher price

manual_governance_fails.problem: Admins manually banned users they disliked

utility_drives_demand.mistake: No sink for inflation except mining shares

the_death_of_devcoin.devtome_offline: Original wiki went down, taking literature with it
the_death_of_devcoin.survivor_status: Still has blockchain record - outlived 99% of 2013 peers
the_death_of_devcoin.legacy: Proved bounty model works, taught burn mechanics essential

quiz_questions.q: What percentage of DevCoin block rewards went to writers?
quiz_questions.explanation: Most radical Proof-of-Value split of the era

quiz_questions.q: What was the 'Golden Ratio Algorithm' used for?
quiz_questions.a: Fair payout order so addresses weren't paid alphabetically
quiz_questions.explanation: Ensured '1A' addresses didn't always pay before '1Z'

quiz_questions.q: How many authors did FinShaggy scale DevTome from/to?
quiz_questions.explanation: The scaling that threatened the Core 15's share sizes

quiz_questions.q: Why did the $1 DVC prediction fail despite $1,000 BTC coming true?
quiz_questions.a: DVC inflation vs BTC scarcity broke the 1000:1 ratio theory
quiz_questions.explanation: Token supply matters - burn mechanics were missing

quiz_questions.q: What lie was used to justify banning FinShaggy?
quiz_questions.a: Accused of paying a 'Fiverr Girl' for YouTube videos
quiz_questions.explanation: Was actually a personal friend helping voluntarily
